application.Entities

Class SimpleEnemies

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Entities.Entity
      • application.Entities.SimpleEnemies
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StraightLineEnemy, WallFollowingEnemy

    public abstract class SimpleEnemies
extends Entity
    Super class of the simple enemies that aren't affected by the player. Sub class of the entities class
    Version:
    1.6.0
    Author:
    Nayan Shrees
